profile.name: Vijaykumar Karthikeyan
profile.title: Founder, Developer, and Researcher
profile.bio: Hi, I'm Vijay! I like science, soccer, and pandas. I am a current second-year undergraduate studying Bioengineering and Computer Science at UCLA. I am the Co-founder and CTO of Cogenesis, Inc.

experiences.title: Senior Biohacker
experiences.description: Leading research in neural interface development and biohacking technologies. Developing cutting-edge solutions for human enhancement.
achievements: Developed neural interface prototype with 95% accuracy

experiences.title: Biohacker Toolkit
experiences.description: Open-source platform for biohackers to track and optimize their biological metrics using machine learning.

experiences.title: Bioinformatics Engineer
experiences.description: Developed algorithms for genomic data analysis and personalized medicine applications.

experiences.title: Sleep Optimization AI
experiences.description: AI-powered system that analyzes sleep patterns and provides personalized recommendations for optimal rest.
achievements: Improved sleep quality by 40% for test users

experiences.title: Master of Science in Bioengineering
experiences.description: Specialized in computational biology and human enhancement technologies.

experiences.title: Valedictorian
experiences.description: Graduated as valedictorian with focus on science and mathematics.
